title: Electromagnetics
description: To present the laws and applications of electromagnetics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (ECE 2025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2026 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or NRE 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
